subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Kevin Garnett scored 20 points and Rajon Rondo dished out double-digit assists for his 17th consecutive game to help lead the Celtics to a 103-79 win over the struggling 76ers on Sunday.
snippet: Kevin Garnett scored 20 points and Rajon Rondo dished out double-digit assists for his 17th consecutive game to help lead the Celtics to a 103-79 win over the struggling 76ers on Sunday.
